content.howToPlay:
The traditional approach in a car game would be to give zero cash to the player at the beginning. This means waiting and playing for a long time to use any cool feature a game might offer. However, we told you Drift King is different. Here's a step-by-step guide to get you started.

Drift King puts 30,000 coins in your pocket, right as you enter the game. This allows you to buy most of the cars in the garage, upgrade the parts, and tune them as you like before you.So, our suggestion is to first hang out in the garage a bit. Find the car you like the most, explore upgrades and tuning options. If you're not sure how to tune your car, find our complete guide on tuning. Then move on to maps. You have six options in the maps section. Select a map that will describe your drifting experience, your environment preferences, and what you expect from the game.Some of maps have racetracks while some are long countryside roads with slight curves. It's up to you.If you spawn onto the map, now aim for the longest drift. Keep the speed high and perform manji drifts and donuts. Or go freestyle and follow the curves of the road while leaving S-shaped marks behind you.
